info.title: Operate a mixed checkbox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstCheckbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('[role="checkbox"]').focus();

user: With focus on the 'All condiments' checkbox, change its state to 'checked'.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'All condiments' checkbox, change its state to 'checked'.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Change in state, to 'checked', is conveyed
